page.title: 11The Community Centre
page.content: Since the village school closed in 1983 the building has become the Community Centre and the committee faced with the task of raising money for its conversion.Building work on the fire exits and car park is currently in progress, partly financed by a council grant but more money is needed for improving heating,kitchen, general equipment and storage. Fund raising events this year have included a Sunday lunch at Firs Farm where 125 people enjoyed Roast Turkey, vegetables and sweet for Â£3.50 which raised around Â£300.350 people attended the Barn Dance in July at Bunyan Farm which raised Â£500.The Grand Raffle, with first prize of a weekend in Amsterdam took place during the evening nd raised Â£650.The next event is a race evening.
